mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'P' THEN 1 END) AS 'P', -- 출근 COUNT(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'L' THEN 1 END) AS 'L', -- 지각 COUNT(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'A' THEN 1 END) AS 'A', -- 결근 COUNT(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'V' THEN 1 END) AS 'V', -- 연차 COUNT(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'H' THEN 1 END) AS 'H' -- 반차 FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date = CURDATE();

SELECT emp_no empNo, attendance_date attendanceDate, attendance_status attendanceStatus, clock_in_time clockInTime, clock_out_time clockOutTime, create_datetime createDatetime, update_datetime updateDatetime FROM attendance WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND attendance_date = #{attendanceDate}
